attributes.action: disallow mobile phone network providers from charging for calls to freephone numbers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Network providers have been charging us all to call 0800 numbers as well as other freephone numbers, which as we know are generally supposed to be free. an example could include that of the child line for abused children, and should a child need to call to report abuse via mobile they would be unable to without being charged, or simply would be unable to if they were using a pay as you go tariff and had no credit on their account.
